item.title: Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: We acknowledge the Wurundjeri people, Elders past and present, and their continuing connection to land and community.

item.title: Our purpose
item.description: We support and protect the long-term wellbeing of construction workers and the vitality of our industry.

item.title: Our values
item.description: Here for Members • Empower our People • Thrive Together • Anticipate & Create.

item.title: Employee Assistance Program – support anytime
item.description: Confidential counselling and support is available 24/7 for you and your immediate family via the Employee Assistance Program. Reach out if you need support.

item.title: Welcome back to work for 2026
item.description: Hope you had a great break with family and friends and feel refreshed for the year ahead at LeavePlus.

item.title: Bushfires support
item.description: Craig acknowledged the Victorian bushfire devastation and thanked emergency workers. If you’ve been impacted, contact People & Culture for support.

item.title: Big year ahead: transformation and change
item.description: 2026 will bring major transformation changes. Expect new ways of working and better member experiences; communication and adaptability will be essential.

item.title: New starters: Yogita Patil & Alex Downey
item.description: Please welcome Yogita Patil and Alex Downey (Consultants, Member Response), who started on Monday 5 January 2026.

item.title: Farewells: Camilla van den Broek & Ameya Kate
item.description: Camilla van den Broek and Ameya Kate finished on Monday 5 January 2026. Thanks to both for their contributions and best wishes for the future.

item.title: Internal move: Lecxie Osorio – Employer Obligations
item.description: Lecxie Osorio moved from Member Response to Employer Obligations on 5 January 2026.

item.title: Internal move: Namrata Banerjee – Service Investigations
item.description: Namrata Banerjee moved from Member Registrations to Service Investigations on Monday 12 January 2026.

item.title: Executive Team offsite – Mon 19 & Tue 20 Jan
item.description: The Executive Team will be offsite on 19–20 January to plan Horizon 2 strategy as we work to complete the business transformation later this year.

item.title: Ask Us Anything returns in February
item.description: The next ‘Ask Us Anything’ session will commence in February. Calendar invites will be sent shortly.

item.title: Balcony now open for bookings
item.description: The balcony is ready for use. BBQ joinery is nearly complete (stone benchtop finishing). Max capacity 60; no alcohol without prior CEO/Executive approval.

item.title: Present Acknowledgement of Country at Town Hall
item.description: Interested in presenting the Acknowledgement of Country at a Town Hall meeting? Sign up via the EOI to help make the moment meaningful for everyone.

item.title: Wellness tip: move every hour
item.description: Don’t sit all day. Set a timer to stand and stretch each hour, take a short walk, or do light bodyweight exercises—small movement boosts energy and mood.

item.title: Internal Careers page via ELMO
item.description: Looking for a new role? Check the Internal Careers page via ELMO for current opportunities.

item.title: Role open: Consultant – Member Registrations
item.description: A Consultant – Member Registrations (Permanent) role is listed on the Internal Careers page.

item.title: Role open: Change Communications Lead (Max term)
item.description: A Change Communications Lead (Max term) role is listed on the Internal Careers page.

item.title: Role open: Compliance Field Officer
item.description: A Compliance Field Officer (Permanent) role is listed on the Internal Careers page.

item.title: All Staff Teams channel: announcements & events
item.description: For updates you may have missed (Announcements, Events, Shoutouts), head to the All Staff Teams channel for the latest news.

item.title: Town Hall – Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: Interested in presenting the Acknowledgement at a future Town Hall? Submit an expression of interest.

item.title: Book Club
item.description: Love a good read? Join the LeavePlus Book Club. Open to everyone. Contact Avi Mandal for details.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Artemis Rohanian
item.description: Recognised for exceptional collaboration and positive change. A true change champion who builds connections and drives progress.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Lisa Bihari
item.description: Created 15 Coverage Hub profiles with high quality and speed, adopting governance and sharing knowledge to help smash PI5 goals.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Andrew Mackenzie
item.description: Supported Elevate squads, briefed CFMEU delegates, connected industry stakeholders for testing, and kept member experience front of mind.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Keely Lock
item.description: Wrote and rolled out a Returns training plan; engaging and easy to follow, with docs provided and hands-on support during practice.

item.title: LOVE Award People’s Choice – Helen Hawkins
item.description: Celebrated for making onboarding and training seamless, fun and interactive, helping new starters consolidate knowledge.

item.title: LOVE Awards – Nominate a Colleague
item.description: Seen someone living our values? Nominate them for a LeavePlus LOVE award.
